How a little-known Finnish company became one of the world’s hottest gadget startups | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
How a Little-Known Finnish Company Became One of the World’s Hottest Gadget Startups

Publication Date: Current Date & Source: Company Business News

In the startup world, Oura stands out as a profitable unicorn in the competitive consumer electronics market. Their smart ring has gained millions of users by focusing on health tracking rather than just fitness metrics.

  • Oura is valued over $5 billion and remains profitable.
  • The smart ring tracks heart rate, skin temperature, and movement.
  • It provides users with a “readiness score” based on comprehensive health data.
  • Insights are derived from a vast health data pool, contributed by over 70,000 users.
  • The ring can predict when wearers may be getting sick.
"Users wake up to a 'readiness score' that factors in sleep quality and stress levels."

The Oura smart ring is transforming how individuals approach health monitoring, signaling a new direction in consumer electronics.
newTitle: How a Little-Known Finnish Company Became One of the World’s Hottest Gadget Startups

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 5G Plus Gets Massive Discount On THESE Platforms During Republic Day Sale; Check Deals - Zee News
summary:
Samsung Galaxy S24 5G Plus Gets Massive Discount On THESE Platforms During Republic Day Sale; Check Deals

Date: January 22, 2025 Source: Zee News

The Samsung Galaxy S24 5G Plus receives significant discounts on Amazon and Flipkart during the Republic Day sale, just days before the launch of the Galaxy S25 series. The price reductions make the flagship model more accessible to buyers.

  • The Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus 5G (256 GB) originally priced at Rs 99,999 is discounted to Rs 64,999 on Amazon, a 35% discount.
  • Amazon includes a cashback offer of Rs 1,949 for Amazon Pay transactions and exchange offers up to Rs 53,200 for old smartphones.
  • On Flipkart, the same model is available for Rs 59,999, reflecting a 40% discount.
  • Flipkart offers 5% cashback with Flipkart Axis Bank Credit Card and exchange values up to Rs 38,150.
“Original price was Rs 99,999; now available at Rs 64,999 on Amazon.”

These discounts provide substantial savings for customers looking to purchase a premium smartphone, highlighting the competitive market just before the launch of new models.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S24 5G Plus Gets Massive Discount On Platforms During Republic Day Sale

summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Prices Leak Ahead of January 22 Launch Event

Published On: Jan 18, 2025 | Published By: Aman Rashid

The Galaxy S25 series, set to launch on January 22, is anticipated to see a price increase compared to the previous Galaxy S24 lineup, with significant changes in storage and RAM configurations.

  • The Galaxy S25 base model starts at Rs 84,999, a jump from last year's Rs 74,999.
  • The Galaxy S25+ will begin at Rs 1,04,999, up from Rs 99,999.
  • Galaxy S25 Ultra's starting price is expected at Rs 1,34,999, compared to Rs 1,29,999 for the S24 Ultra.
  • The higher production costs related to the new Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset may contribute to the pricing increase.
“Whether this performance boost justifies the price increase remains to be seen.”

As the launch date nears, Samsung is accepting pre-bookings, indicating strong interest despite higher pricing expectations.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Pricing Expected to Rise Before Launch

Santosh Kamath, the fixed-income chief at Franklin Templeton MF, returns with a new private credit alternative investment fund after dismantling six debt funds in 2020 that totaled ₹25,000 crore.

  • He stepped down from his role in 2023 to lead the newly established alternatives business.
